\[%mdk-data-line={89}
\begin{aligned} 
y &\sim Normal(\alpha_y + \beta_{yx}x + \beta_{yz}z, \sigma_y) \\
x &\sim Normal(\alpha_x + \beta_{xz}z, \sigma_x) \\
z &\sim Normal(\alpha_z, \sigma_z) \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk

\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[3c3959fdf30ff0ba7538c2fdf60bb5c5]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={106}
\begin{aligned} 
y &\sim Normal(\mu, \sigma) \\
\mu &= a + bx \\ 
a &\sim Normal(0, 0.3) \\
b &\sim Normal(0, 0.3) \\
\sigma  &\sim Exponential(1)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
